channel.title: Dedicated Servers\VPSs\Need Help Fast
channel.description:
Ok Well. I was thinking that we might get a 24/7 server uptime and no lag by getting dedicated.
Now I need some questions answered.
1) Whats better price + quality wise: Dedicated Server, VPS, Co-Location, Shared Hosting? 2) What's a good cheap + greaet quality site for this? 3) Are VPS's any good? 4) Most dedicated servers are over 100$+ a month. VPS's are cheaper. Which one should you still go for? 5) How do Co-Location servers work? 6) How do shared hosting servers work? 7) What do you reccomend and why?

item.title: Dedicated Servers\VPSs\Need Help Fast
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

zoltanman:

Go to zipservers.com, they are easy to setup. NGW used those, it help 150+, it’s a $0 setup also. If you want to know how good a VPS is, then look at pkisle v.1 and 2. It crashes alot.

So VPS’s are bad? =\

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated Servers\VPSs\Need Help Fast
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Stanyer:

VPS, i pay £27 a month for mine alot i know but holds 150 players no lag.

Its 24/7 and I dont need to host or do anything with it at all right? Like I dont need my comp. on?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2007, 12:47:58 PM[/size][hr]And, do you buy it and they ship it to you is it like an external computer or just like a dedicated server online?

And if you order one, can hostname be anything or is it something specific?

Read full topic
